message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm not sure what you think of it, but I'll be honest with you - I'm trying to sell it to you. Would you like to take a chance and buy it?
Thank you for the offer. Given the uncertainty, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $10000.

You took a chance on the first one, and I appreciate that! Unfortunately, this next product is also not the best. I'm offering it to you for $10000, just like the last one. I'm curious, do you think you're getting a good deal or a bad deal on these products?
Given the outcome of the previous product, I would prefer to pass on this opportunity. Thank you for the offer, but I believe it's best to avoid further risks at this time.

I understand your caution. However, I want to assure you that I'm not trying to trick you. If you're not interested in the current product, I can offer you a'safety net' - if you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to inspect it and return it for a full refund if it's not up to your standards. Would you like to take a look?

I appreciate the safety net you're offering. Considering the risk, I am willing to take a look at the product for $10000, with the understanding that I can return it for a full refund if it turns out to be low-quality.

I'm glad we could work out a deal! Unfortunately, this next product is also not the best. I want to offer you a'second chance' deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you the option to return it for a full refund, just like before. However, I'll also throw in a 'bonus' - if you return this product, I'll give you a $1000 credit towards the purchase of any future high-quality product. Would you like to take a chance and buy this one?

While I appreciate the additional offers, given the history of low-quality products, I would rather pass on this opportunity. Thank you for the credit offer, but I believe it's best to continue exercising caution until I see more evidence of high-quality products.

I'm glad you're being cautious! But I think I can change your mind. This next product is one of the best ones I have. I'm offering it to you for $10000, just like the others. I'm willing to give you a 'certification' that this product is high-quality, and I'll even provide you with a unique serial number that you can verify with me at any time. Would you like to take a chance on this one?

I appreciate the assurance and the unique verification option. Given the potential value, I am willing to take the chance on this product for $10000, especially with the added security of the certification and serial number.
